Note: I am an English speaker, and this is translated through online dictionaries -- if any English & Swedish speaker reads this and is willing to translate, please do so.
English Comment:
Yes, it's a short movie (98 minutes) and not extremely high quality (I used mencoder to rip it from the DVD).  The movie is hilarious, though.  Also, it's in english.

Poor try at Swedish:
Ja, den se be a kort stavelse film (98 minuten) och inte ankommen egenskap. Film se be komisk. även se be pa engelsk.

Okay, I found a Swedish speaking friend who was able to translate it (why wasn't he on earlier? >_<):

Ja, det är en kort film (på 98 minuter) och den har inte så hög kvalitet (jag använde mencoder för att rippa den från DVD format). Filmen är dock dråplig. Den är också på Engelska.
He meant that this isnt a DVDr, a dvdr is 4.0-4.7GB and is not 700mb and is in AVI, so, please change it to Movies, so people wont complain to you that this is an odd DVDR etc.
Ah, I understand. It should be updated now.
